attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Traffic Lights on Roundabouts? They were invented to make Traffic flow now yuo get stopped by a light halfway round,Bus stop bays filled in,Roads Narrowed,Pedestrian Operated Traffic lights,Underpasses filled in in preference to Zebra/Pelican Crossings. These are the Main Causes for Congestion Not the Car,I say reverse this Lunacy Now, Keep Traffic Moving and cut down the effects of Pollution and Journey times.

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UrbanRoads/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
